Blog.post: today got co... from 3 to 6... sit until so long... so my butt damn pain... now standing up using computer... actually i secretly use computer this few days... my mum give me a rule say that i cannot use computer during school days... now she is not at home... but i have to use it fast as i do not know wad time she will be back... today erhu practice was ok... not bad and not gd too.. not gd becoz i dunno how to play... not bad is becoz i know the fingering... i know it sounds strange... but i do not know how to play properly... haiz.. my erhu bag teacher did not bring... den december got erhu exam... sure die onez... i stop here lah... i heard my mum opening the door... byez

Yahoo! finally found my a maths textbk... its under pei xuan's table... almost wanna buy new book... and summore at home before i go to sch, i look for wrapping paper but cannot find... wah... i so happy! saved my $22... but still need another $6 for my erhu bag... i need to thank pei xuan alot for helping me to find it~~~~

4 days sure pass fast.. did not do anything much... juz dance dance and more dance.. got a chanc to watch my tv but not too much play... got some time to catch up on studies too.. at least i did study a bit.. like maths and english etc. haiz... i sure kenna scolding tomorrow... a maths before recess.. and summore did not do a maths hw... no bk how to do sia... i use other pple book also can wad... but all having lessons tomorrow.. how? i juz gonna buy it during recess time... den do the hw on my own... haiz

now is the day where everyone celebrates... but not me... i dunno why also... but i think its becoz i performed 2 dances at concourse... 1 is my teacher's cherograph the dance... the other is i ownself learn a bit den juz jump in... so scared... the first dance is dancing with the wind... that dance was ok... but not the second dance... the second dance is come on get up... that dance i like shit... but is ok lah... i know how to dance that aleady... on this day i very happy also... becoz i play a machine that is free.. actually need to pay for tokens... 1 token got 3 credits... its becoz a group of kids playing before us put in alot of tokens and did not know that they havent finish playing all the credits and went home... we got to play 8 credits.. its damn great... we saved about $10-20 leh... so shoik... den go out and eat with some aunties and my teacher... den went to meet my sis at suntec city.. she ate laksa there... den get to see fireworks... damn nice... and go to tangs sales at the suntec exhibition hall... i wanted to buy the sims online cd... but too ex... but at least i bought my chocolates.. at concourse, there damn nice.. although its a bit small... from the top view, the whole place is covered with red... damn beautiful... wish everyone have a happy national day!
today is a damn fun day... go to gelang to dance... my friend, yi ling is with me now... so happy her mum let her come to stay over... play alot of games at gelang too...very fun... really love it!

i damn tired now.. getting sick soon.. dunno will get well nortz... hope sch reopen den ok... haiz... juz came back from bedok... dancing again... dunno how come i like dancing so much... haiz... i dunno wad to write already... i go play my math for the real world again... ahhhhh.. maths again... haiz... study time again... time to sign off..

todae school half day... very happy... but still thinking about my a maths textbook... so i am half happy and half not... juz came back from sunplaza park...line dancing there... damn fun... there saw my friend yi ling.... my best buddy... play games together... on sunday going to gelang line dance also... but countdown till national day... i wanna shout it out loud!? HAPPY BIRTHDAY SINGAPORE!!

today is a very bad day for me... lost my a maths textbk... $21.05 leh... the most expensive textbk bought in my school... sobzZzZ... i very sad now.. cannot do the a maths homework... got 4 questions leh... sure kenna scolding onez.... nid to buy new one and this time muz wrap it already.... den no one wanna take my book... den write my name big big... like that sure no problem with losing the book... and today derrick birthday.. juz keep on saying happy birthday to him... lolz
Finally create finish my blog... Abit like shit but i will try to update everydae...
